reporter_caption.center: PROSPECTING UNLIMITED, INC. v. NORBERG, 115 R.I. 930 (1975)

caption.center: PROSPECTING UNLIMITED, Inc. et al. v. JOHN H. NORBERG, Tax

opinion.posture: Motion of defendant to dismiss the appeal is denied without prejudice. Case consolidated for the filing of briefs and hearing before Supreme Court with the case of Prospecting Unlimited, Inc.v. Norberg, 115, R.I. 929, 345 A.2d 883 (1975).
opinion.attorneys:
Joseph F. Vitullo, for plaintiff.
Julius C. Michaelson, Attorney General, Allen P. Rubine, Special Asst. Attorney General, Perry Shatkin, Chief Legal Officer, Division of Taxation, for defendant.Page 931
